column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////We got a banana brioche and a chocolate chip cookie
column2: both of which were quite delicious. The chocolate chip cookie was one of those good kinds
column3: with crispy edges but a gooey
column4: melty chocolate inside. I also got an iced cappucino
column5: which came in a tall glass but was only filled halfway (they intentionally only fill half the glass
column6: but I think visually you would feel like you got your money's worth if it was a full cup).
